topic.title: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section - conformance rules

section.p: Information regarding patient allergies and sensitivities

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11396 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies and adverse reactions Document (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10196)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions" which SHOULD equal "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions" (CONF:10948)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10953)
Conforms to Non Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.49)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11319)
Conforms to Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.183)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies and adverse reactions Document (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10196)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions" which SHOULD equal "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions" (CONF:10948)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10953)
Conforms to Non Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.49)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11319)
Conforms to Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.183)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.13"/> <code code="48765-2" displayName="Allergies and adverse reactions Document"/> <title>EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions</title> <text/> </section>

p.ph: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section
